Developer Terms of Use
des:
Connect motorized products by 3 Day Blinds® to Amazon Alexa, using the 3 Day Blinds® Motorization Hub, and effortlessly control your window treatments with just your voice. Control shades individually or set up scenes/timers to automate your products and make everyday life easier. 

To use Amazon Alexa voice-control to control your 3 Day Blinds® Motorized products, you will need the following:
• 3 Day Blinds® Motorization Account with a 3 Day Blinds® Hub registered to the account
• An Amazon Alexa-enabled device connected to your Google account
• The Amazon Alexa App downloaded and installed on your mobile device

Individual Shade/Blind:
To control individual shade/blind, simply say “Alexa, open/close” followed by the AMP™ Motorization Shade name, like:
• “Alexa, open Honeycomb 1.”
• “Alexa, close Roller 2.”

Scenes:
Once you have designated the Scenes you want to operate with Alexa, simply say “Alexa, turn on” followed by the 3 Day Blinds® Motorization Scene name to activate the Scene, like:
• “Alexa, turn on Good Morning.”
• “Alexa, turn on I’m Home.”

For more information on 3 Day Blinds® Motorization products, visit: www.3dayblinds.com
